meanings.definition: A sound of weeping or crying.
meanings.sent1: The baby's boohoos could be heard throughout the house.
meanings.sent2: I heard the boohoos of a sad child in the park.
meanings.sent3: The boohoos of the puppy made everyone rush to comfort it.
meanings.sent4: The boohoos of the wind through the trees sounded like a mournful song.
meanings.sent5: Her boohoos were so loud, they echoed in the empty room.

meanings.definition: To cry or weep loudly and uncontrollably.
meanings.sent1: She boohoos whenever she watches sad movies.
meanings.sent2: The child started to boohoos after losing his favorite toy.
meanings.sent3: He always boohoos when he has to eat vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The storm seemed to boohoos as it raged outside.
meanings.sent5: The actor's performance made the audience boohoos with emotion.
